entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
